```{r, include=FALSE,message=FALSE}
if(exists("snakemake")){
  database.file <- snakemake@input[["db"]]
  hits.file = snakemake@input[["hits"]]
  commonscript.file = snakemake@input[["commons"]]
  readanno_sampled_overview.file = snakemake@input[["readanno_sampled_overview"]]
  threads=snakemake@threads
}else{
  database.file = "/run/user/2496/gvfs/sftp:host=highmem1/data1/2019_LJ_data/bachelor_thesis/metadiet/output/databases/readanno/prot/cytochrom.tsv"
  hits.file = "/run/user/2496/gvfs/sftp:host=highmem1/data1/2019_LJ_data/bachelor_thesis/metadiet/output/Analysis/read_annotation/cytochrom/cytochrom_combineddata.tsv"
  readanno_sampled_overview.file = "/run/user/2496/gvfs/sftp:host=highmem1/data1/2019_LJ_data/bachelor_thesis/metadiet/output/Analysis/sequence_data/readanno_sampled/readanno_sampled_overview.tsv"
  commonscript.file = "commonReport.R"
  threads=NA
}
taxcols=c("superkingdom","phylum","class","order","family","genus","species")
files = c(hits.file,database.file)
source(commonscript.file)
commonOptions(threads)


readanno_sampled_overview = fread(readanno_sampled_overview.file)
hits <- fread(hits.file)
database <- fread(database.file)
hits = rbind(hits,cbind(sample="Database",database),fill=T)
hits[,sample:=factor(sample,levels = c(setdiff(unique(sample),"Database"),"Database"),ordered = T)]
hits[,seqlen:=nchar(Sequence)]
taxdat=hits[,.N,by=c("sample",taxcols)]
```

### Distribution of Sequence lengths
```{r}
seqlendens=hits[,density(seqlen)[c("x","y")],by="sample"]
seqlendens=seqlendens[x>=min(hits$seqlen)&x<=max(hits$seqlen),]
ggplotly(ggplot(seqlendens)+aes(x=x,y=y,color=sample) + scale_color_brewer(palette = sample_palette) + geom_line()+xlab("Sequence Length")+ylab("(Estimated) Density")+labs(color="Sample"))
```

> The distribution of the sequence lengths in the database
